did.unittitle: Kentucky Theatre (movie theater), 214 East Main, exterior, street scene; night shot of the Grand Reopening of theater after redecoration of interiors, marching band and onlookers under the lit awning; State Theatre "colored" (African American) balcony entrance (208 East Main), Martin Rosenberger Wall Paper Co. (210 East Main), and Rio Luncheonette (216 East Main) are all visible
